page.title: 05YOUNG ORNITHOLOGIST CLUB
page.content:
I am a member of the {Young { Ornathologist Club.} It is held twice a month. One week we have a talk or quiz inside and the next time we go on an outing. The Y.O.C. is held in school from 3.00 p.m. until 4.00 p.m. I am the treasurer of it. We also have a shop which Tanya McMillan and I run. Mr Evans who put the idea to the children is present as well. We have been on a trip to the {rookery } at Mrs Gilbert's corn mill and the Bird {Sanctuary }at Carrickfergus Leisure Centre .We have twenty one members who have joined. When they joined they received a beautiful sew on kestrel {badge} and also a membership card. All of the boys and girls love going to Y.O.C. and enjoy it very much indeed.
Julie Cornett.
